mapper.select: select ifnull (( select a.no from chat a join (select d.no from chat d join chat_member e on d.no = e.chat_no where e.user_no = #{userNo}) b on a.no = b.no join (select f.no from tikitaka.chat f join tikitaka.chat_member g on f.no = g.chat_no where g.user_no = #{authNo}) c on c.no = b.no where a.type = "PERSONAL") , '0');
